name: Mall Master
description:
Mall Master - now you can design, build and manage shopping mall. Create your own successful business and make your customers happy.
Mall Master gives you the opportunity to create a happy, stress-free work environment...
of course, if you can do it.

Managing:
Be your Boss on your own, Create the Best Mall in Town,
bring more customers than ever, rebuild, and create exciting new locations and shops.

Features:
● Buy, land, and build your mall
● create different shops in your mall
● extend the possibilities of your store, bring more people to your business
● Share with other players your successes
● Employ more workers
● Mange transport
● Grow bigger and bigger like a real shopping Boss
